creditline: Gift of The Frederick and Margaret L. Weyerhaeuser Foundation
description: Standing male figure with proper right leg forward and foot turned, leaning forward and playing a lute; he is wearing a light blue jacket with pink lapels, grey pants, black hat and yellow sash.
markings: Blue crossed swords, impressed \'102\', hand marked \'7\', and \'j5\' in red paint under base.
title: Lute Player
